author: James Joyce
text: Dear Pappie I have arrived safely but am so busy seeing people that I shall not be able to write till Sunday. I expect by then to have definite news. Mr O’Connell was out of town but I left a note for him. Mr Yeats is to write me the result today or tomorrow. I send in reviews tomorrow and hope to receive Stannie’s letter in the morning. Tell Mother that Dr Rivière gave me a déjeuner of seven courses today. So much saved! Jim
